title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2208.5 - Service and filing of a PAR
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2208.5 - Service and filing of a PAR
State Regulations
(a) Each PAR shall be filed in an original and one copy at the Division of Housing
and Community Renewal, Office of Rent Administration, 10 Columbus Circle, New

York, NY 10019, unless otherwise provided on the form prescribed by the
administrator for such PAR. (b) Where the PAR is against an order issued by the district rent administrator, a
copy of the PAR shall also be served on the district rent administrator issuing
the order and upon each party affected by the PAR. (c) A PAR under section
2208.4
of this Part will not be
accepted for filing unless accompanied by an affidavit or other proof of such
service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2208.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
